channel.title: How 2 fix my range?
channel.description:
Ok for some reason... No matter what ange attack.... No matter what weapon.... I always run up to the npc or person before attacking. It also does not take a away arrows? How would I fix both of these?
Thankyou.....
~~The Prodigyscape!~~
